arts.ttl: Antonio Conte seeks counsel from Kevin De Bruyne ahead of Manchester City return
arts.sum: Napoli face the 2023 winners in their opening Champions League tie.

arts.ttl: Conte leans on De Bruyne for Napoli’s ‘students against teachers’ clash with Manchester City
arts.sum: Coach has asked Belgian for advice on former team ‘We’re against a team where history speaks for itself’ Antonio Conte said Napoli’s opening Champions League game at Manchester City will pit his “students against the teachers” of Pep Guardiola’s side, with the Italian asking Kevin De Bruyne for advice about his former team. Napoli will make their debut in the 36-club format in Thursday’s meeting with City. While they were last in the competition two years ago, Conte was not in charge then. He views his side as still in development despite being Serie A champions. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola thinks ‘it’s not a surprise’ that Napoli are excelling with his former talisman
arts.sum: Man City will reunite with a brilliant Belgian in this game as well as the man who spoiled the Spaniard's first year at the Etihad Stadium : their success "is not a surprise" to the 54-year-old. City started their Champions League campaign against a Serie A side last term, drawing 0-0 with eventual Champions League finalists Inter Milan .

arts.ttl: Man Utd embarrassed again as Hojlund becomes Napoli's Haaland
arts.sum: Rasmus Hojlund is expected to start for Napoli against Manchester City and his 'idol' Erling Haaland as he seeks to prove that Manchester United were wrong to force him out. Man Utd embarrassed again as Hojlund becomes Napoli's Haaland

arts.ttl: Journalist jokes Napoli need ‘beatings’ to stop Manchester City ‘force of nature’ – Conte will want star in a ‘cage’
arts.sum: Napoli’s only hope of stopping Erling Haaland when they take on Manchester City is to beat him into submission. That’s at least the way Carlo Jacomuzzi would do it, as he joked about the situation via Area Napoli today.
